text: The Flying Fox in the Snowy Mountains is a two-part 1964 Hong Kong film based on Louis Cha's novel Fox Volant of the Snowy Mountain. The film was produced by Emei Film Company and directed by Lee Fa. ==Cast== * Chiang Han as Wu Fei / Wu Yat-dou * Pearl Au as Yuen Tze-yi * Sheung-kwun Yuk as Ching Ling-so * Chan Wai-yu as Mrs Wu * Ng Yam-chi as Miu Yan-fung * Shih Kien as Yim Kei * Yuen Siu-tien as Lau Hok-jan ==External links== * * Category:1964 films Category:Films based on works by Jin Yong Category:Hong Kong films Category:Wuxia films Category:Works based on Flying Fox of Snowy Mountain
title: The Flying Fox in the Snowy Mountains
